name: Marine Fire Extinguisher - 5kg CO2
description: SOLAS-approved CO2 fire extinguisher for marine use
fullDescription: High-quality 5kg CO2 fire extinguisher designed specifically for marine environments. Fully compliant with SOLAS regulations and MED certified. Suitable for Class B and C fires.

name: Automatic Inflatable Lifejacket 165N
fullDescription: Premium automatic inflatable lifejacket providing 165N buoyancy. Features automatic inflation upon water immersion and manual backup. SOLAS approved for commercial vessels.

name: LED Navigation Light - Port Side
description: Energy-efficient LED navigation light for port side
fullDescription: High-visibility LED navigation light designed for port side mounting. Energy-efficient LED technology with long service life. Meets COLREG requirements.

name: Marine GPS Chartplotter X12
fullDescription: Professional-grade GPS chartplotter featuring a bright 12-inch touchscreen display, preloaded charts, and advanced navigation features including AIS integration.

name: VHF Marine Radio Transceiver
description: 25W VHF radio with DSC and GPS
fullDescription: Professional VHF marine radio transceiver with 25W output power, integrated DSC and GPS receiver. All international channels included.

name: Diesel Engine Fuel Filter
description: High-efficiency fuel filter for marine diesel engines
fullDescription: Premium fuel filter designed for marine diesel engines. Features high-efficiency filtration to protect fuel injection systems. Suitable for engines up to 500HP.

name: 6-Person Coastal Life Raft
description: Compact life raft for coastal navigation
fullDescription: Coastal life raft designed for 6 persons. Compact valise pack for easy storage. Includes basic survival equipment. Suitable for vessels operating within 50 miles of shore.

name: Emergency Position Radio Beacon (EPIRB)
description: 406 MHz EPIRB with GPS and automatic activation
fullDescription: Category 1 EPIRB with 406 MHz transmission and integrated GPS. Automatic float-free activation in emergency situations. 48-hour battery life.

name: Heavy-Duty Mooring Rope - 20m
fullDescription: Professional-grade nylon mooring rope with 18mm diameter and 20-meter length. High breaking strength and excellent shock absorption. UV-resistant for long service life.

name: OceanMaster SOLAS Life Raft (12 Person)
fullDescription: OceanMaster SOLAS Life Raft engineered for reliability in harsh marine environments. Approved for commercial vessels and supplied with full SOLAS emergency pack.

name: Propeller Shaft Seal
fullDescription: Advanced dripless shaft seal system that eliminates the need for traditional packing glands. Maintenance-free operation with superior sealing performance.

name: Anchor Chain 10mm G43
fullDescription: Grade 43 galvanized anchor chain with 10mm link diameter. Suitable for medium displacement yachts and workboats.

name: LED Deck Floodlight 30W
description: IP67 LED floodlight for deck and work areas
fullDescription: Rugged 30W LED deck floodlight providing wide-beam illumination for work decks and cockpits. IP67 waterproof housing with stainless mounting bracket.

name: Automatic Bilge Pump 1500 GPH
fullDescription: Submersible bilge pump with built‑in float switch delivering 1500 GPH at 12V. Suitable for engine rooms and deep bilge compartments.

name: Stainless Steel Deck Cleat 8"
fullDescription: Marine-grade AISI 316 stainless steel deck cleat with 8 inch length, ideal for mooring and spring lines.

name: LED Cabin Light 12V White
fullDescription: Sleek LED cabin light with warm white illumination. Low power consumption and long lifespan. Surface mount design with stainless steel trim.

name: Halogen Bulb BA15D 25W
description: Replacement halogen bulb for marine fixtures
fullDescription: Standard BA15D base halogen bulb suitable for navigation lights and interior fixtures. 25W power rating.

name: Remote Control Searchlight 100W
fullDescription: High-intensity 100W searchlight with wireless remote control. 360-degree rotation and adjustable beam angle. IP67 waterproof rating.

name: Waterproof LED Torch Rechargeable
fullDescription: Durable rechargeable LED torch with 500 lumen output. IPX8 waterproof rating, floats on water. Includes USB charging cable.

name: Underwater LED Light Blue 60W
description: High-power underwater LED light in blue
fullDescription: Marine-grade underwater LED light with blue illumination. Through-hull installation. Creates stunning underwater ambiance and attracts fish.

name: Dual Trumpet Air Horn
description: Loud dual trumpet air horn for marine use
fullDescription: Chrome-plated dual trumpet air horn with compressor. 120dB output meets USCG requirements. Includes mounting hardware.

name: Battery Selector Switch 4-Position
fullDescription: Rotary battery selector switch with 4 positions (OFF/1/2/BOTH). 300A continuous rating. Corrosion-resistant construction.

name: Inline Bilge Blower 4 inch
fullDescription: High-flow inline blower for engine room and bilge ventilation. 4-inch duct connection. Ignition-protected for safe operation near fuel vapors.

name: Digital Fuel Gauge with Sender
description: Digital fuel level gauge with tank sender
fullDescription: Precision digital fuel gauge with LED display. Includes adjustable tank sender unit. Programmable for various tank sizes.

name: Power Distribution Bus Bar 12-Circuit
fullDescription: Tinned copper bus bar with 12 circuit positions. Includes negative bus and cover. 100A main rating with individual circuit protection.

name: Marine Wiper Motor Kit
description: Complete wiper motor and arm kit
fullDescription: Heavy-duty wiper motor kit with stainless steel arm and blade. Self-parking feature. Suitable for windshields up to 30 inches.

name: 6-Gang Rocker Switch Panel
description: Waterproof switch panel with LED indicators
fullDescription: 6-gang switch panel with illuminated rocker switches. Each switch has LED indicator. Circuit breaker protected. Splash-proof design.

name: AGM Deep Cycle Battery 100Ah
fullDescription: Premium AGM deep cycle battery with 100Ah capacity. Sealed, maintenance-free design. Excellent for house bank and trolling applications.

name: Hydraulic Magnetic Circuit Breaker 30A
fullDescription: Panel-mount circuit breaker with push-to-reset button. Hydraulic magnetic trip mechanism. Ignition protected.

name: Solar Panel 100W Monocrystalline
fullDescription: 100W monocrystalline solar panel with marine-grade aluminum frame. Includes mounting brackets and MC4 connectors. 25-year warranty.

name: Heavy Duty Relay 12V 80A
fullDescription: Sealed relay suitable for high-current switching. 80A continuous rating. Coil voltage 12V DC. Corrosion-resistant terminals.

name: Marine Tinned Copper Wire 10 AWG
fullDescription: Premium tinned copper wire with UV-resistant insulation. Meets ABYC standards. Sold per foot. Available in multiple colors.

name: Terminal Block 12-Position
fullDescription: Dual-row terminal block with 12 positions. 30A per terminal rating. Includes cover and mounting screws.

name: Waterproof Shore Power Connector 30A
fullDescription: Locking shore power connector with weatherproof cover. Stainless steel trim ring. Meets NEMA SS2-50P standard.

name: Cable Tie Kit Marine Grade
fullDescription: Assorted cable ties in various sizes. UV-resistant nylon construction. Includes mounting bases. 200-piece kit.

name: ATO Blade Fuse Holder Waterproof
description: Waterproof inline fuse holder for ATO fuses
fullDescription: Sealed inline fuse holder for standard ATO blade fuses. 12 AWG wire leads. IP67 waterproof rating.

name: Junction Box IP67 4-Way
fullDescription: Heavy-duty waterproof junction box with 4 cable entries. IP67 rated. Includes mounting screws and gaskets.

name: Split Loom Tubing 1/2 inch
fullDescription: Flexible polyethylene split loom for wire protection and organization. UV-resistant. Sold per foot.

name: Panel Mount Voltmeter Digital
fullDescription: Compact digital voltmeter with LED display. 2-inch round panel mount. Monitors 8-32V DC range.

name: Freshwater Pressure Pump 4.5 GPM
fullDescription: Quiet-running diaphragm pressure pump delivering 4.5 GPM at 45 PSI. Self-priming up to 6 feet. Ideal for galleys and heads.

name: Bronze Seawater Strainer 1 inch
description: Bronze raw water strainer with clear bowl
fullDescription: Heavy-duty bronze strainer for engine cooling water intake. Clear polycarbonate bowl for easy inspection. 1-inch NPT connections.

name: Brass Pipe Elbow 90° 1/2 inch
fullDescription: Marine-grade brass 90-degree elbow with 1/2-inch NPT threads. Corrosion-resistant for freshwater and seawater systems.

name: Bronze Ball Valve 3/4 inch
fullDescription: Heavy-duty bronze ball valve with lever handle. Full-port design for maximum flow. 3/4-inch NPT threaded connections.

name: Quick Connect Coupling Set 1/2 inch
fullDescription: Stainless steel quick-connect coupling for easy hose connection/disconnection. Includes male and female fittings. 1/2-inch hose barb.

name: Speedfit Push-Fit Elbow 15mm
fullDescription: Quick and easy push-fit elbow for 15mm pipe. No tools required. Suitable for potable water systems.

name: Wet Exhaust Hose 4 inch
fullDescription: Reinforced rubber wet exhaust hose for marine diesel engines. Heat and salt-water resistant. Sold per foot. 4-inch ID.

name: Washdown Hose Nozzle Adjustable
description: Adjustable spray nozzle for deck washdown
fullDescription: Brass adjustable spray nozzle with multiple spray patterns. Ergonomic grip with trigger lock. Standard garden hose connection.

name: Bilge Pump Float Switch
description: Automatic float switch for bilge pumps
fullDescription: Mercury-free automatic float switch for bilge pump activation. Adjustable mounting bracket. 20A rating.

name: Reinforced Water Hose 5/8 inch
fullDescription: FDA-approved reinforced hose for potable water systems. Kink-resistant construction. Sold per foot. 5/8-inch ID.

name: Stainless Hose Clamp 1-2 inch
fullDescription: Marine-grade 316 stainless steel hose clamp. Adjustable 1-2 inch diameter range. Hex screw for easy tightening.

name: Plastic Barbed Tee 1/2 inch
fullDescription: Nylon barbed tee fitting for 1/2-inch hose. Lightweight and corrosion-proof. Suitable for freshwater systems.

name: Transom Drain Plug Brass
fullDescription: Threaded brass drain plug for transom or cockpit drains. Includes rubber gasket. 1/2-inch NPT thread.

name: Manual Marine Toilet Compact
fullDescription: Space-saving manual marine toilet with hand pump operation. Porcelain bowl. Suitable for small vessels and sailboats.

name: Electric Marine Toilet 12V
fullDescription: Quiet electric marine toilet with push-button operation. Soft-close seat. Low water consumption. 12V DC operation.

name: Toilet Pump Rebuild Kit
fullDescription: Complete rebuild kit for manual marine toilets. Includes seals, gaskets, and valves. Fits most standard models.

name: Stainless Steel Bow Eye
fullDescription: AISI 316 stainless steel bow eye for anchor rode attachment. Through-bolt mounting. 3/4-inch diameter eye.

name: Stainless Shackle Bow 5/16 inch
fullDescription: Marine-grade stainless steel bow shackle. Screw pin closure. 5/16-inch diameter. 1500 lb working load.

name: Solar Vent Cowl Stainless
fullDescription: Polished stainless steel deck vent cowl. Directional design for optimal airflow. 3-inch deck fitting required.

name: Deck Access Hatch 12x12 inch
fullDescription: White ABS deck hatch with watertight seal. Flush-mount design. 12x12 inch opening. Includes mounting screws.

name: Deck Plate 6 inch Screw-Out
fullDescription: White plastic screw-out deck plate for tank and storage access. O-ring seal. 6-inch diameter.

name: Telescoping Swim Ladder 3-Step
fullDescription: 3-step telescoping swim ladder with stainless steel construction. Folds flat when not in use. Transom mount.

name: Rod Holder Flush Mount SS
fullDescription: Stainless steel flush-mount rod holder. 15-degree angle. Includes drain holes and cap. Standard 1.9-inch tube.

name: Inflatable Fender 8x20 inch
fullDescription: Blue vinyl inflatable fender with reinforced eye. 8-inch diameter, 20-inch length. Includes inflation valve.

name: Fender Cover 8 inch Navy
fullDescription: Navy blue acrylic fender cover for 8-inch fenders. Protects fender and hull from scuffing. Machine washable.

name: Dock Line 5/8 inch x 25 ft
fullDescription: Premium double-braided nylon dock line with pre-spliced eye. UV-resistant. 5/8-inch diameter, 25 feet long.

name: Marker Buoy Float Orange
fullDescription: Bright orange foam marker float. Unsinkable construction. Ideal for crab pots, anchor lines, and markers.

name: Trailer Winch 1500 lb
fullDescription: Heavy-duty manual winch with 1500 lb capacity. Includes 20 feet of strap and hook. Corrosion-resistant finish.

name: Marine Stereo Bluetooth Receiver
fullDescription: IPX6 waterproof marine stereo with Bluetooth streaming. USB input and AM/FM radio. 4x50W amplifier output.

name: Marine Speakers 6.5 inch Pair
fullDescription: 6.5-inch 2-way coaxial speakers with UV-resistant white cones. 150W peak power. Stainless steel mounting hardware included.

name: Lifebuoy Ring 24 inch SOLAS
fullDescription: 24-inch diameter lifebuoy ring with SOLAS approval. High-visibility orange with reflective tape. Includes grab line.

name: Safety Harness with Tether
fullDescription: Adjustable safety harness with 6-foot tether and double clips. Meets ISO 12401 standard. Suitable for offshore sailing.

name: Hydraulic Steering System Kit
description: Complete hydraulic steering kit for outboards
fullDescription: Complete hydraulic steering system for outboard motors up to 150HP. Includes helm pump, cylinder, and hoses. Smooth, responsive steering.

name: Flush Mount Compass 3 inch
fullDescription: 3-inch flush-mount compass with internally gimbaled card. Compensator magnets included. Black housing with white card.

name: Fuel Deck Fill with Cap Stainless
fullDescription: 316 stainless steel fuel deck fill with locking cap. 1.5-inch hose connection. Clearly marked 'FUEL'.

name: Fuel Line Primer Bulb 3/8 inch
fullDescription: Universal fuel primer bulb for outboard motors. 3/8-inch hose connections. Ethanol-resistant construction.

name: Boat Wash and Wax 32oz
description: Premium boat wash and wax formula
fullDescription: Concentrated boat wash with carnauba wax. Removes salt, dirt, and grime while leaving protective shine. Biodegradable formula.

name: Deck Brush with Handle
fullDescription: Heavy-duty deck brush with stiff bristles and 48-inch handle. Ideal for non-skid surfaces. Threaded handle connection.

name: Marine Sealant 3M 5200 3oz
fullDescription: 3M 5200 marine-grade polyurethane adhesive sealant. Permanent, flexible bond. Excellent for hull-to-deck joints and hardware mounting.

name: Zinc Anode Shaft Collar 1 inch
fullDescription: Zinc shaft anode for 1-inch propeller shafts. Prevents galvanic corrosion. Split collar design for easy installation.

name: Marine Grease Waterproof 14oz
fullDescription: Premium waterproof grease for marine bearings and fittings. Resists washout. NLGI Grade 2. 14 oz cartridge.

name: Gelcoat Repair Kit White
fullDescription: Complete gelcoat repair kit in white. Includes resin, hardener, and mixing tools. Repairs chips, scratches, and gouges.

name: Antifouling Paint Blue 1 Quart
fullDescription: High-performance self-polishing antifouling paint. Prevents marine growth on hulls. Blue color. 1 quart covers approximately 100 sq ft.
